title: Going Under
description: Brooke Wright is a senior at Charity Run High School who’s just discovered a secret sex club connected to the death of her best friend. She learns that swim team members participate in a “Fantasy Slut League,” scoring girls on their sex acts. Brooke decides to infiltrate the league to seek justice for her friend, but unforeseen danger and an unexpected romance threaten her plans for revenge.
author: S. Walden
